mapper.select: SELECT * FROM share_order so LEFT JOIN orders o ON so.orderNum = o.orderNum LEFT JOIN productinfo_manage pm ON o.productInfoId = pm.id

SELECT so.shareMechanism shareMechanism, o.orderNum orderNum, o.orderMoney orderMoney, o.productNum productNum, o.finishTime finishTime, o.createTime createTime, pm.productName productName, pm.productPicUrl productPicUrl, upd.nickName nickName FROM share_order so LEFT JOIN orders o ON so.orderNum = o.orderNum LEFT JOIN productinfo_manage pm ON o.productInfoId = pm.id LEFT JOIN userapp_person_data upd ON so.buyUserId = upd.registUserId WHERE so.shareUserId = #{shareUserId} AND so.productInfoId = #{productInfoId}
SELECT * FROM share_order so JOIN orders o ON so.orderNum = o.orderNum LEFT JOIN productinfo_manage pm ON o.productInfoId = pm.id WHERE so.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO share_order (orderNum, buyUserId, shareUserId, shareUsername, buyUsername, productInfoId,shareMechanism, commission, merchantName,orderMoney, createTime, updateTime, payStatus, status) VALUES (#{orderNum}, #{buyUserId}, #{shareUserId}, #{shareUsername}, #{buyUsername},#{productInfoId}, #{shareMechanism}, #{commission}, #{merchantName}, #{orderMoney}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{payStatus}, #{status})
mapper.update: update share_order set orderNum = #{orderNum}, buyUserId = #{buyUserId}, shareUserId = #{shareUserId}, shareUsername = #{shareUsername}, buyUsername = #{buyUsername}, shareMechanism = #{shareMechanism}, commission = #{commission}, IsCommission = #{IsCommission}, merchantName = #{merchantName}, orderMoney = #{orderMoney}, createTime = #{createTime}, updateTime = #{updateTime}, payStatus = #{payStatus}, status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select COUNT(buyUserId) AS buyUserIds,SUM(orderMoney) AS orderMoneys,SUM(commission) AS commissions,COUNT(*) AS counts FROM share_order where merchantId = #{merchantId} AND payStatus = #{payStatus}
